lowerCourt: United States Court of Appeals for the Federal Circuit

wikiData.title: Kisor v. Wilkie
wikiData.FullName: James L. Kisor v. [[Robert L. Wilkie]]
wikiData.Prior: ''Kisor v. Shulkin'', 869 [[F.3d]] [https://www.leagle.com/decision/infco20170907123 1360] ([[Fed. Cir.]] 2017); rehearing ''[[en banc]]'' denied, 880 [[F.3d]] [https://www.leagle.com/decision/infco20180131160 1378] (Fed. Cir. 2018); [[Certiorari|cert]]. granted, 202 [[L. Ed. 2d]] 491 (2018).
wikiData.QuestionsPresented: Whether the Court should overrule ''[[Auer v. Robbins]]'' and ''[[Bowles v. Seminole Rock & Sand Co.]]'', in relation to courts deferring to the interpretation made by a government agency in evaluating the regulations that the agency itself had made.
